synopsis.text: The anime tells the story of a music video created for the song "Sekai wo Musubou" performed by Sandra and the Morinoki Children's Choir. The song was featured on the NHK music program "Minna no Uta" which showcases music from around the world. The vibrant animated music video brings together people from diverse backgrounds and cultures to enjoy the beauty of the Mediterranean region. It was animated by acclaimed artist Akira Maeda and conveys a message of global unity and celebration through the universal language of music. By spotlighting this uplifting musical collaboration, the anime video aims to promote cross-cultural understanding and inspire viewers to appreciate both the diversity and commonality of human experiences across the world. With colorful visuals and a chorus of young voices, it provides a window into the Mediterranean culture while connecting to universal themes that resonate with all audiences.
